alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Greenville Downtown, or near GSP Airport, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Eastside, Greer, Taylors, Five Forks, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Reidville, GSP Airport and Mauldin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
